text: @Alyssa_Milano @CAPAction Dumb ass because every single person that does is automatically put on the COVID death list. Notice in the past 3 months nobody dies from cancer, heart attack, diabetes ,gun shot, car accident just coronavirus smh wtf up people it’s fear mongering at its best. Gtfoh
